query:
SELECT s.id, s.scanConfigId, s.status, s.completedAt, COUNT(sr.id) as result_count
FROM scans s
LEFT JOIN scanResults sr ON s.id = sr.scanId
WHERE s.id = 30002
GROUP BY s.id, s.scanConfigId, s.status, s.completedAt
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3gaYF7se9kVaEXG.b9054b9f64d3 --database N26k37rfuZW3JrMwUJG4CN --execute SELECT s.id, s.scanConfigId, s.status, s.completedAt, COUNT(sr.id) as result_count
FROM scans s
LEFT JOIN scanResults sr ON s.id = sr.scanId
WHERE s.id = 30002
GROUP BY s.id, s.scanConfigId, s.status, s.completedAt
